text: Ariel University is a public university in Ariel, a Jewish settlement in the West Bank. It used to be called the "Ariel University Center of Samaria". The university was founded in 1982. == Other websites == *Ariel University Center of Samaria *Friends Of Ariel University Center *Ariel University R&D; Company Ltd, the technology transfer company of Ariel University Center, Israel Category:1982 establishments in Asia Category:Buildings and structures in Palestine Category:Colleges and universities in Israel Category:West Bank
title: Ariel University
